Kaggle uses a notebook structure. This allows you to create and test small sections of code and to use the markdown feature to add text to explain your code.

You can run each section of code by pressing the run button next to it, or by using the single arrow at the top. Clicking the double arrow runs all the code segments.

Start off by importing the Pandas library using the variable pd. You might find these websites useful:
